description: Absolute value between digits of n (version 3).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: If decimal expansion of n is x1 x2 ... xk then a(n) = |x1-x2-x3- ... -xk|.a(n) = |A055017(n)|. - R. J. Mathar, Aug 26 2011a(n) = abs(A000030(n) - A007953(A217657(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 10 2012
prog: (Haskell)a040997 n = abs $ a000030 n - a007953 (a217657 n)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 10 2012
author: _Felice Russo_
